Hello! I'm Bryan Dugan, an interface designer & developer in beautiful Rochester Hills, Michigan.

Currently seeking full-time employment.

Co-founder and developer at Spaceray Creative.

I design and build compelling websites and applications that are both elegant and functional. Creator of custom-tailored presentations and demonstrations through the means of storytelling, visual design, content, development, information architecture, user research and branding.

Spaceray Creative Portfolio
